title: Disney Signage Fonts
content:
Dunno if this has been posted already somewhere, but here's [a list of "incidental typography in the Disney parks."](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221902/http:/boingboing.net/2004_03_01_archive.html#107893661790673078)   
   
Here's the very abridged version on the BoingBoing link to the [complete list](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221902/http:/mickeyavenue.com/fonts/disney-fonts.html):   
   
Albertus - Animal Kingdom (entrance area signage), Norway   
Algerian - MK monorail station, Main Street, Haunted Mansion Fastpass, etc.   
Americana - Main Street, Liberty Square   
Anna - Tomorrowland logo/signage, Studios, etc.   
Antique Olive - Soarin'
author: crugen

comments.content: Ah, I've been neglecting Typographica recently, so I missed it. So busy...
